page.title: 18TOURISM & ITS IMPORTANCE
page.content: Tourism is an increasingly important aspect of our life here. The last few decades have seen vast improvements in facilities enabling the advancement of tourism as an industry. Advertising has bought people to our area, the season now lasts for some 8 months the busiest two months being July & August. There all types of accommodation from self-catering caravans to luxury hotel rooms. Many people are affected and employed because of Tourism. We are well served by a Tourist Office in Lochinver that operate many schemes for helping the Visitors enjoy themselves. The next page is an unashamed advertisement for the area of Assynt, justified because of this area's natural unspoilt beauty, and because it will give a better idea of what the area is about.
